subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Johnny Weir and his rival, Evan Lysacek, finished with identical totals of 244.77. But Lysacek edged Weir for the men’s title because he had slightly better marks in his free skate.
snippet: Johnny Weir and his rival, Evan Lysacek, finished with identical totals of 244.77. But Lysacek edged Weir for the men’s title because he had slightly better marks in his free skate.
